Room.Name: Overland Drive/Appleton Road Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Appleton Road and Overland Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Appleton Road runs diagonally through the southern portion of town and crosses Overland Drive, running north and south from here. On the west side of the intersection, you can see the Klondike Wheat Fields where wheat and grain is harvested for the town. On the east side of the road are a number of small shops, but not accessible from here.
